girl.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Both boys and girls can apply to join the choir.
I’ve known Mollie ever since I was a little girl.
The patient was a girl of 12.
girl.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: They have two girls and a boy.
How old’s your little girl  (=someone’s young daughter) now?
girl.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a word meaning a woman, especially a young woman, which is considered offensive by some women
girl.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: I’ll invite some of the girls from the office.
Steve’s married to a lovely Dutch girl.
girl.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: used when speaking to a female animal, especially a dog, cat, or horse
girl.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: Bring me the stick. Good girl!
girl.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a word for a woman who you are having a romantic relationship with
girl.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: used by a woman when she is speaking to another woman she knows well
